definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: division, divided opinion;—pl. abs. [[עַל־שְׁתֵּי הַסְּעִפִּים]] 1Ki 18:21 how long are ye limping on the two divided opinions (as on unequal legs; LXX tai=v i)gnu/aiv seems an attempt to interpret the fig.; acc. to Albrecht:ZAW xvi (1896) 75 ´[[ס]] really = legs).
